name: Mario's Bob-omb Blast
description:
Destroy as many targets as you can to get the highest score. 

Targets are worth 10 points. They'll respawn in random places.

Knock a Bob-omb out of the air for a 30 point bonus.

Grab a Super Mushroom to restore your health.  

Use the arrow keys to move and "Shift" to jump over enemies. Press the Space Bar to kick a star into the air and hit Targets and Bob-ombs.

Don't tell Nintendo please. Have fun :)
